item.title: Sylvester Stalloneâ€™s Divisive $91.5M Rambo Sequel Enjoying Streaming Resurgence As Wait For Tulsa King Season 3 Continues
item.description: A sequel from the Rambo franchise hits a major streaming chart as the wait for season 3 of Sylvester Stallone's crime show Tulsa King continues.

item.title: Brandon Sklenar's Batman Fan-Casting Comes To Life To Adapt One Of DC's Most Famous Comic Stories Alongside Jason Todd In New DCU Art
item.description: Jason Todd's biggest DC Comics storyline comes to life along with Brandon Sklenar's Batman popular fan-casting through new DC Universe artwork.

item.title: Divisive Remake Of Iconic Horror Franchise Getting New Streaming Home On The Heels Of Disappointing TV Cancellation
item.description: An infamously divisive remake of a classic horror franchise is getting a new streaming home, along with it original, after a recent TV cancellation.
